英文法規名稱: The Organization Act of the Directorate-General of Personnel Administration, Executive Yuan
中文法規名稱: 行政院人事行政總處組織法
沿革內容: 1.Promulgated on November 14, 2011 and enforced on February 6,2012

法規內容.條文內容:
The Executive Yuan shall establish a Directorate-General of personnel Administration (hereinafter referred to as the Directorate-General) under its purview to formulate policies and carry out and develop personnel administration. 
The functions of the Directorate-General that pertain to the civil service examination and qualification reviews shall fall under the supervision of the Examination Yuan.

The Directorate-General shall have one minister, specially appointed; and two deputy ministers, one of whom shall be a political appointee of equivalent ranking to Senior 14th grade and the other a civil servant ranked Senior 14th grade.
The Directorate-General shall have one chief secretary, ranked Senior 12th grade.
The official ranks, grades, and headcounts of personnel at the Directorate-General shall be regulated by a separate Personnel Establishment Table.
This Act shall come into force on the date prescribed by the Executive Yuan.
